customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter a status indicator to set on each record exported successfully. Default is success if this field is left blank.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Status Indicator

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option for NS account with multiple currencies.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Multiple Currency

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to map subsidiary field to ARC division field.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Map Subsidiary To Division

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a default subsidiary for invoices without subsidiary set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Subsidiary

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to map department field to ARC division field.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Map Department To Division

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a default department for invoices without department set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_zc_ap_configs.default_department_lbl]

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to use to apply payment coming from ARC.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Payment Method (Default) - * Required

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to be mapped for ACH payment method transactions. Default payment method will be used if not set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: ACH - Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to be mapped for Visa payment method transactions. Default payment method will be used if not set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: VISA - Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to be mapped for MasterCard payment method transactions. Default payment method will be used if not set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MasterCard - Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to be mapped for AMEX payment method transactions. Default payment method will be used if not set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: AMEX - Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a payment method to be mapped for Discover payment method transactions. Default payment method will be used if not set.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Discover - Payment Method

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to push new or updated payment to ARC upon saving. Note: Excludes payments created in ARC.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Payment

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to push new or updated customer to ARC upon saving.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Customer

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to push new or updated customer contacts to ARC upon saving.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Customer Contacts

customrecordcustomfield.description: Netsuite - ARC Push Created Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.help: Netsuite - ARC Push Created Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Created Credit Memo

customrecordcustomfield.description: Netsuite - ARC Push Deleted Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.help: Netsuite - ARC Push Deleted Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Deleted Credit Memo

customrecordcustomfield.description: Netsuite - ARC Push Voided Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.help: Netsuite - ARC Push Voided Credit Memo
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Voided Credit Memo

customrecordcustomfield.description: Netsuite - ARC Upload Credit Memo PDF
customrecordcustomfield.help: Netsuite - ARC Upload Credit Memo PDF
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Upload Credit Memo PDF

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to push new or updated invoice to ARC upon saving.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Netsuite - ARC Push Invoice

customrecordcustomfield.description: Include Invoices (Closed Period - Must Enable Allow Changes Option)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this feature to include invoices from closed periods. You must enable the allow non G/L changes in each closed periods.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Export Include Invoices (Closed Period - Must Enable Allow Changes Option)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option if Netsuite account invoice supports recurring billing. This will retrieve the recurring billing field for the invoice extraction date.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Invoice Supports Recurring Billing

customrecordcustomfield.description: Export For One Credit Memo (Internal Id)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Export For One Credit Memo (Internal Id)
Last Auto Sync Date (DO NOT EDIT)

customrecordcustomfield.description: Last Customer Auto Sync Date (DO NOT EDIT)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Last Customer Auto Sync Date (DO NOT EDIT)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Last Customer Auto Sync Date (DO NOT EDIT)

customrecordcustomfield.description: Last Customer Auto Sync Date - Company (DO NOT EDIT)
customrecordcustomfield.help: Last Customer Auto Sync Date - Company (DO NOT EDIT)
customrecordcustomfield.label: Last Customer Auto Sync Date - Company (DO NOT EDIT)

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to retry failed import record to ARC
customrecordcustomfield.label: Retry Failed Export Record

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter number of days to sync from. Default is current day.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Auto Sync History Days {Options: 1,2,3,4,5,6,10}

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enable this option to include all contacts for each customer.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Include Contacts

customrecordcustomfield.description: Number of Customer Record Per Execution
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter number of customer records to import into ARC per execution. Default is 250 customer records.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Number of Customer Record Per Execution

customrecordcustomfield.description: Number of Unapplied Payment Record Per Execution
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter number of unapplied payment records to import into ARC per execution. Default is 250 unapplied payment records.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Number of Unapplied Payment Record Per Execution

customrecordcustomfield.description: Number of Credit Memo Record Per Execution
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter number of credit memo records to import into ARC per execution. Default is 250 credit memo records.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Number of Credit Memo Record Per Execution

customrecordcustomfield.description: Number of Invoice Record Per Execution
customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter number of invoice records to import into ARC per execution. Default is 250 invoice records.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Number of Invoice Record Per Execution

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a single customer to export invoices, payments, and credit memos
customrecordcustomfield.label: [scriptid=custcollection_fsm.app_addnewtask_customer_name]

customrecordcustomfield.help: Only available for Versapay Team and UAT Testing must be enabled.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Dev Environment (Requires UAT Testing Enabled)
Dev Environment URL (Default Dev0 if blank)
